short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never read again, just summarize it

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Summarize in any webpage in 3 bullet points and ask follow up questions.

⚡️ Learn fast
⏭️ Skip the fluff
💬 Ask questions
🎯 Get only the info you need
⍜  Simple & minimal

Use Cases:
🔬 Research: stocks, markets, new tech, etc
📰 News: get the facts, avoid the sensationalism and filler
📚 Documentation: ask about your problem, no more reading dry technical docs
🏛️ Gov docs: skip legalese and bureaucratic language, get the actionable gist

Why not just ChatGPT?
❌ Outdated content
❌ Lacks rich context of what you are currently looking at
❌ Verbose

QuickRead AI helps you do less busy-work so you can do the things you love. ❤️
